subject: [R] add info
body:
hi all:
If there's a dataframe:

x y
1 a
2 b
3 c

The info of the data such as :

name
date
author

The result I want is:

name
date
author
x y
1 a
2 b
3 c

In other words,I wanna add the info above the dataframe.

How can I do it ?

Thanks a lot!


My best
